name: chess-com-player-statistics
title: Chess.com Player Statistics
description: Search for Chess.com players and view their ratings.

commands.name: search-players
commands.title: Search Players
commands.description: Search for a player and view their stats.
commands.subtitle: Chess.com Player Statistics

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: JamexCEO
